description: This source file appears to be part of the implementation of an object in a C-based object-oriented system, specifically the Bmc2ComExecutor object. It includes functions for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the executor, with details for managing internal interfaces and global dependencies.

classes.name: BMC2_COM_EXECUTOR_OBJECT
classes.description: Represents the main object implementing the Bmc2ComExecutor functionality, including properties and function pointers for object management.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE Bmc2ComeoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Constructs and initializes a new Bmc2ComExecutor object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS Bmc2ComeoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the Bmc2ComExecutor object, freeing resources.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS Bmc2ComeoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls all objects required by the executor, including interface setup.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS Bmc2ComeoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the executor object, setting up its property and interface functions.
